title: MASCULINE DOMINATION (english) Bourdieu
description:
Masculine Domination , english 174 pages.

-----------------------------------------------

















note: Bourdieu was perhaps the best postwar sociologist. When young he saw the catasthrophic showdown of french administration (and colonization) in Argelia , and this gave him for ever an almost anglosaxon respect and love for the concrete facts of life. This , united with the french intellectualist tradition could only provide a lucid and at the same time deep analyst of the everyday-happening failures of our social constructions.
